Fales Library and Special Collections
Jarrod Anderson Drawings
Anderson, Jarrod
MSS.474
1 linear feet in 1 oversize flat box
2006-2007 Jarrod Anderson is an artist/illustrator. He graduated from Ringling School of Art and Design in 2003. Anderson was the illustrator for The Weaklings (2008), written by Dennis Cooper. He has also exhibited his artwork in various galleries. Anderson's collection consists of nine very fine line graphite drawings, with a similar look to etching. Works were executed in 2006, 2007, and some undated. Subjects consist of human figures, everyday objects, and vignettes. Materials are in English. Fales OS 1 1
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of nine drawings by artist/illustrator Jarrod Anderson, executed between 2006-2007. The works are very fine line drawings in graphite, with a similar look to etching. Subjects consist of human figures, every day objects, and vignettes.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Biographical / Historical
Jarrod Anderson is an artist/illustrator. He graduated from Ringling School of Art and Design in 2003. Anderson was the illustrator for The Weaklings (2008), written by Dennis Cooper. He has also exhibited his artwork in various galleries.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.
Conditions Governing Use
NYU's Fales Library & Special Collections is not the copyright owner for this collection. Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Researchers wishing to reproduce collection material should contact rights holders for permission.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Jarrod Anderson in 2017; the accession number associated with this gift if 2017.009.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Jarrod Anderson Drawings; MSS 474; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, materials were moved into archival housing and described on the collection level.
Drawings Figure drawing. Human figure in art. Art, American -- 21th century
